docs.snippet: THE SUPPOSED MURDER AT HOBOKEN. The body of the man found in the water near the Elysian Fields, who had been shot and stabbed was identified. yesterday, by a man who boarded in the same house with deceased in New-York. His name was R. GATTI, a native...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE SUPPOSED MURDER AT HOBOKEN. The body of the man found in the water near the Elysian Fields, who had been shot and stabbed was identified. yesterday, by a man who boarded in the same house with deceased in New-York. His name was R. GATTI, a native of Germany.

docs.snippet: JEFF. DAVIS, the arch-rebel of the South, is as wary as he is wicked. Let us be well assured of this. There is, for the moment, a lull in his war-notes.

headline.main: Jeff. Davis and How to Fight Him.

docs.lead_paragraph: JEFF. DAVIS, the arch-rebel of the South, is as wary as he is wicked. Let us be well assured of this. There is, for the moment, a lull in his war-notes.

docs.snippet: It will be seen by our Washington dispatches that the Secretary of the Treasury has decided to call for proposals, to be received until the 30th inst., unless the whole should, be sooner taken at par, for about $14,000,000 United States Stock.
docs.lead_paragraph: It will be seen by our Washington dispatches that the Secretary of the Treasury has decided to call for proposals, to be received until the 30th inst., unless the whole should, be sooner taken at par, for about $14,000,000 United States Stock.

docs.snippet: Senator HUNTER, W. C. RIVES, W. D. PRESTON, Judge CAMDEN and BROCKENBROUGH have been appointed by the Virginia Convention as delegates to the Southern Congress.

headline.main: Highly Intersting from the Federal Capital.; DISPOSITION OF THE TROOPS THERE A Government Censorship of Telegraphic Dispatches.Martial Law to be PartiallyEstablished.Preparations for Repairing theRailroads.MILITARY MOVEMENTS IN VIRGINIA.TROOPS CONCENTRATING AT DUMFRIES.Delegates Appointed to the SouthernCongress.The Continuous Tide of Men and Money OUR WASHINGTON CORRESPONDENCE.

docs.lead_paragraph: Senator HUNTER, W. C. RIVES, W. D. PRESTON, Judge CAMDEN and BROCKENBROUGH have been appointed by the Virginia Convention as delegates to the Southern Congress.
